azurerm_site_recovery_protection_contain.description: Manages a site recovery services protection container on Azure.

name.description: The name of the network mapping.

resource_group_name.description: Name of the resource group where the vault that should be updated is located.

recovery_vault_name.description: The name of the vault that should be updated.

recovery_fabric_name.description: Name of fabric that should contain this protection container.

id.description: The ID of the Site Recovery Protection Container.

create.description: Used when creating the Site Recovery Protection Container.

update.description: Used when updating the Site Recovery Protection Container.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Site Recovery Protection Container.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Site Recovery Protection Container.
